  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Allow the serialization of data, to put every information of an enterprise inside a file. We do that serialization every 5 seconds in case there are modifications (and if the application suddenly close)
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • Serialization

      public static void Serialization​(java.lang.String NomFichier) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Write all information of an enterprise (on the application) in a file
      Parameters:
      NomFichier - The directory of the file to put all the information into.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • Deserialization

      public static Enterprise Deserialization​(java.lang.String NomFichier) throws java.io.IOException
      Take out all information of an enterprise from a file
      Parameters:
      NomFichier - The directory of the file to take all the information from.
      Returns:
      The information of a certain enterprise stocked in the file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
